thread.section_title: Juniqe Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Juniqe | juniqe.com
thread.title: Jonas T

author: Jonas T
title: Jonas T
text:
Having purchased some shirts from Juniqe, I sadly discovered that they were not my size, so I had to return them and get a new size. No problem what so ever. Extremely helpful with an over the top kind of customer service (Only in a good way) I really felt good taking my business to this company. My package also got lost on its way to me, no problem, they sent a new one. When I then received both, they were as helpful as usually!
Can only recommend this great place.
